1.title: What kind of transformation?

12.content:
"Hey you're the pastor's kid right?" A woman with fiery red hair, covered in tattoos asked you as you took a short cut through the park. She was flanked by two equally tattooed men, one with a shaved head and the other with a patterned buzz cut.

You hang your head down low as you continued to walk. A huge 6 foot 5 man made of muscles blocked your way. "It's rude to ignore someone when they ask you a question," he barely pushed you, causing you to fall flat on your ass.

"Gentle, Crusher, we've got no beef with the kid, just hear to deliver a message from the old man is all," the woman held out her tattooed hand to help you up, giving you a better look at her face, she had heaps of piercing on her face, including above the eye, a couple in her nose and one on her lip. You took her hand and pulled away.

"Shadow just helped you up, what do you say?" Crusher asked standing behind you.

"Thank you..." you muttered under her breath.

"You won't be thanking me in a second. Like I said, I'm here to deliver a message," she said as she ran her finger tips through her long hair. "And you're not going to like it."

You turned to Crusher as he puts a fist in his hands. The other two guys seem to be looking at you menacingly as well. You brace yourself for a beating when Shadow laughs.

"Not that kind of message," she chuckles, causing her three companions to follow. "Nah, I'm here to warn you, your dad's zealous church has drawn the attention of some powerful people. People with abilities you couldn't possibly imagine."

"Oh they are going to fuck your family up," the bald lackey laughed.

"Again, not in a physical way..." Shadow assured you.

"Why tell me? I have nothing to do with my step father's church."

"You're his son and sons pay the sins of their father, blood related or not," Shadow says as she paces back and forth in front of you. "The fact you aren't involved with the church and you are only his step son is what gives you this warning."

You try to look for an opening to escape from these thugs but there's no where to run and all the bystanders know not to get involved with them.

"That's the other reason we're giving you this warning, you might soon find yourself in the position to destroy the church, if you do find yourself in that position, you know where to find us." Shadow snapped her fingers and the other three backed off, allowing you to go home. "Oh and one more thing, don't get comfortable with the skin you're in."

You ran away from them as soon as they let you and headed straight for home.

Though as you were running you blinked and suddenly found yourself in...

You are wearing a skirt and tank top, which gives you a clear look at your, hopefully borrowed breasts. You wondered how this could have happened, when you remembered the thugs in the park. You got up to see if anyone else was home, though it now felt weird walking in your sister's body, with its natural sway and her hair partially covering your vision.

13.content:
There had been a strange mood around the house, lately. Something felt off, like you were being watched but there was never anyone there. You were also having strange dreams, all of which involved a shadowy figure out to get you and the members of your family. In the dream you always woke up just before the shadow caught you and your family, until this morning, where it swallowed the five of you whole. You didn't know what it meant but you knew something was different this morning and you weren't able to put your finger on it.

13.title: Transformation

151.content:
For the past few weeks, you've been getting strange letters in the mailbox. Threatening your family in weird and disturbing ways. You don't know who's been doing it and your mother and step-father have even taken this to the police, who haven't been able to do anything about it.

You wished your mother never married your step-father as all it has seemed to have done is put a target on your back. He ran a very popular church, who had made many enemies and there were those inside the church that weren't happy with him marrying your mother. They also weren't fond of you as you didn't attend the services anymore.

You saw a squad car parked out front when you got home, this wasn't the first time, but it was still unusual. You entered the house and went to the living room, where everyone was waiting with two officers. It seemed like you got another note.

'Tonight's the night, on the stroke of midnight you'll know our wrath.' The note, like always, was made up off news paper clippings, making them hard to trace.

"This is a serious threat to my family, officer!" Your step-dad pointed harshly on the note. "We've been getting these things for a month now, why haven't you done anything about it?"

"We've been trying pastor, may I suggest you stay in a motel tonight?" The officer asked.

"Uh-uh, no way. This is my home, I'm not leaving it over some heathen who has a grudge with us," he flatly refused the idea.

"Okay sir, I understand. We'll have a patrol car stationed on the street if that's better," the officer suggested.

"That's better. Now if you don't mind, I'll like it if you stepped outside the house so we can have some peace and quiet.

The officers left as instructed but stayed nearby. You and your family carried on with the rest of the day as if nothing happened. Stacy and Jenna made dinner, as your father expected, he was old fashioned like that. He even got Jenna to set the table, like always. You sat down at the table and held hands, you said grace as you did every night and then you were excused for the evening.

You were playing some violent video games as usual, ready to alt tab at a moment's notice. Your step-father didn't like violent games and he had threatened to donate your computer if he caught you playing them again.

It was almost midnight now and you laid in bed, thinking about the note. What did it mean? What was going to happen? The clock struck twelve and you felt something strange happen to your body....
151.title: Body Part Swap

1512.content:
As soon as it hit midnight, you felt a strange feeling in your crotch as your pajama bottoms flattened. Your heart raced as you slid your hand down your pants, and felt the outer lips of a woman's vulva. Instantly you threw the blankets off your bed and lowered your pants. Though you had already touched it, you didn't want to believe it but now you were looking directly at it there was no denying, your genitals had been replaced with someone else's.

You knew it belonged to someone else because the hair around it, didn't match your previous pubic hair, in fact it matched the brown hair of your mother and sister. Somehow you either had a copy of theirs or you had swapped with one of them.

You tried to tell yourself that this was a dream that it wasn't happening but you heard screams coming down the hallway. You lifted up your pants and opened the door, running down the hall to your sister's room. You didn't knock as you opened the door and saw her with the covers pulled back, touching your former genitals.

"We really did swap..." you mutter to yourself.

"This is yours! And you have mine?!" Jenna screamed.

You nodded and lowered your pants, blushing in embarrassment.

"Um... that's not mine..." Jenna corrects you as she examines it.

All the colour fades away from you as you feel like you're going to faint. Having your sister's genitals was bad enough, but this was your mother's this was the one you came out of.

A second later, your mother and step-father enter the room. It's revealed that your mother now has your step-father's penis and your step-father has your sister's vulva.

You look at each other and wonder how this was possible, though you all know it had something to do with these threats. Who could do something like this and what would cause them to do it, what worried you more was whether or not this was it or it was just the beginning.
1512.title: Your penis disapppeared
